description: Java class representing a Note entity persisted via JPA, with annotations for persistence, validation, and Lombok-based getters/setters.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: Entity class for notes, with fields id, title, content, createdAt, updatedAt, createdBy, updatedBy, and associated annotations for JPA and validation.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the UUID identifier of the note.

methods.name: setId
methods.description: Sets the UUID identifier of the note.

methods.name: getContent
methods.description: Retrieves the content of the note.

methods.name: setContent
methods.description: Sets the content of the note.

methods.name: getCreatedAt
methods.description: Gets the creation timestamp of the note.

methods.name: setCreatedAt
methods.description: Sets the creation timestamp of the note.

methods.name: getUpdatedAt
methods.description: Gets the last update timestamp of the note.

methods.name: setUpdatedAt
methods.description: Sets the last update timestamp of the note.
